title: Processing Credits for Vendor Returns
intro: Use this flow to create a credit for returned or damaged vendor items. This follows the DSD Returns Without Reference path.

fields.label: Vendor No.
fields.help: From the vendor or the store credit info book.

fields.label: R/A No.
fields.help: Enter the invoice number again when prompted.

steps: Open: 5. Returns → 2. DSD Returns W/O Ref.
Enter the header details: Vendor No., Return PO No. (invoice number), Article Ref. (leave blank), Return PO Date (today).
Press Enter (or F12) to continue to the product list.
Press F5 (Create) to open a new PO return if prompted.
In the R/A No. field, enter the invoice number again.
Scan each UPC (or key it) and enter the quantities being returned.
Press F12, then choose 2: Save and Release to finalize and print the credit.
example: Example: Pepsi returns — Returns → DSD Returns W/O Ref→ Vendor No. 1028096 → Return PO No. = invoice → date = today → reason = QA → scan all cases → F12 → Save and Release.
